headline.main: JAPANESE CLAIM FULL RAIL VICTORY; All Hangchow-Nanchang Line Reported Seized -- Chungking Acknowledges Losses EQUIPMENT IS DESTROYED Road Was Last Important One Operated by Chinese -- Foe Moves Toward Fukien

lead_paragraph: TOKYO, July 1 (From Japanese broadcast recorded by The Associated Press) -- Japanese forces in China effected complete occupation of the Hangchow-Nanchang Railway today as vanguard units driving toward each other from the east and west met at Hengfeng, Domei reported.
